citations.narrative:
One enclosure housing dogs had broken wires. Another enclosure had an exposed screw point. These sharp points
could injury the dogs housed in these enclosures. Repair these dog enclosures by removing/repairing these sharp points.
Correct by 3-3-2022.

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
The outdoor runs for the dog enclosures have an excess amount of feces present. Dog feces must be removed from
primary enclosures daily to prevent soiling of the dogs and to reduce disease hazards and reduce odors and pests. Clean
these enclosures on a daily basis in order to promote a healthy environment for these dogs.
Correct by: 3/3/2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(i) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
One enclosure housing dogs had broken wires.  Another enclosure had an exposed screw point.  These sharp points 
could injury the dogs housed in these enclosures.  Repair these dog enclosures by removing/repairing these sharp points. 
Correct by 3-3-2022. 
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
The outdoor runs for the dog enclosures have an excess amount of feces present.  Dog feces must be removed from 
primary enclosures daily to prevent soiling of the dogs and to reduce disease hazards and reduce odors and pests.  Clean 
these enclosures on a daily basis in order to promote a healthy environment for these dogs. 
Correct by:  3/3/2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
